name: DIY New-tella

ingredients.name: natural peanut butter butter or almond butter

preparation: In food processor, combine nut butter with cocoa powder and honey, if desired, until smooth. Keep refrigerated up to 2 weeks.
tips: Spread over toast, waffles, or pancakes, or roll up in crepes. Swirl through yogurt or mix into cookie or muffin batters.
For a smoother, creamier texture, stir in milk or non-dairy alternative, 1 tbsp at a time.
